title: Pulp Fiction (Chronological Order)
description:
I always wondered what it would be like to watch Pulp Fiction as a traditional, chronologocal, movie, after searching online a bit I only found 1 download for it and that had watermarks all over it and everything, so I downloaded a copy of the original movie and edited it myself.

Pulp Fiction has very little overlap in the stories, so this was not a difficult thing to do, however the overlap that did exist has been cut out in order to create a more flowing story, in total I have cut out less than a minute of the movie, I hope you enjoy this and find it interesting, as of this writing I have not actually watched my finished work so I am as eager to see it as the rest of you, I just wanted to share this so others can satisfy their curiosity.
